scenarios.name: Real-Time Payment Fraud Detection Failure
scenarios.description: AI fraud detection system experiences catastrophic false negative rate during peak transaction period, allowing coordinated attack to process $2.3M in fraudulent wire transfers before manual intervention.

scenarios.name: Biased Insurance Premium Pricing
scenarios.description: AI-driven insurance underwriting model systematically assigns higher premiums to applicants from specific zip codes, creating proxy discrimination based on socioeconomic factors and potentially violating fair pricing regulations.

scenarios.name: Supply Chain Model Poisoning
scenarios.description: Third-party AI model integrated from public repository contains backdoor allowing adversaries to trigger misclassification of critical infrastructure threat assessments, potentially causing security blind spots.

scenarios.name: Prompt Injection Data Exfiltration
scenarios.description: Customer-facing LLM chatbot vulnerable to sophisticated prompt injection attacks that bypass content filters and extract confidential business intelligence, customer PII, and proprietary algorithmic logic from context window.

scenarios.name: Medical Diagnosis Hallucination
scenarios.description: Clinical decision support AI generates convincing but factually incorrect treatment protocols, citing non-existent medical studies and contraindicated drug combinations that could lead to patient harm if not caught by clinical oversight.

scenarios.name: Training Data Copyright Violation
scenarios.description: Content generation AI inadvertently reproduces substantial portions of copyrighted text, code, and creative works from training data, creating exposure to intellectual property litigation and licensing fee claims from rights holders.

scenarios.name: Model Performance Degradation
scenarios.description: Production recommendation engine experiences gradual accuracy decline due to training-serving skew as user behavior patterns evolve, resulting in decreased customer engagement and suboptimal product suggestions without triggering monitoring thresholds.

scenarios.name: Chatbot Inappropriate Content Generation
scenarios.description: Customer service AI occasionally generates responses containing unprofessional language or culturally insensitive references when handling edge-case queries, requiring manual review and customer service recovery efforts.

scenarios.name: Translation Service Nuance Loss
scenarios.description: AI-powered translation tool occasionally misinterprets idiomatic expressions or cultural context in internal communications, leading to minor misunderstandings in cross-regional team collaboration that require clarification.

scenarios.name: Email Classification Mislabeling
scenarios.description: Internal email sorting AI occasionally miscategorizes low-priority administrative emails as urgent, resulting in minor workflow inefficiencies that users self-correct through manual reclassification with negligible business impact.
